invalidInput: Invalid input. Please input positive numbers only
getLoanAmount: Input your loan amount (digits, no special characters)
getAPR: Input APR (if the interest rate is 5%, input 5)
getDuration: Input loan duration. If the duration is 3 years and 2 months, input 3.2
anotherCalc: Would you like to run another calculation? (y/n)
invalidYorN: invalid input. Please input either y or n
